pageProduct.name: Olay Eyes Ultimate Eye Cream 15ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Get the instant results of Olay Eyes Ultimate Eye Cream, the #1 prestige eye cream, without the price tag (for great results on dark circles & wrinkles). Instantly reduces appearance of dark circles, wrinkles, and puffiness.


Features:
- Instantly reduces appearance of dark circles, wrinkles, and puffiness
- Acts as a touch of concealer that matches most skin tones
- Hydrates skin to smoothen and brighten the tone around the eye area
- Charged with peptides, Vitamin B3 and Olay's colour-correcting technology, the cream renews skin surface over time
-  Reduces appearance of deep wrinkles in 4 weeks
- RESULTS: 86% of women agree it reduces dark circles under the eyes and 89% agree it leaves skin around the eyes smoother

Olay Eyes Ultimate Eye Cream is a 3-in-1 eye cream that is supercharged with peptides and Vitamin B3 to instantaneously reduce the appearance of dark circles, wrinkles and puffiness. Get the instant results of the #1 prestige eye cream, without paying 2x as much*.

*For dark circles, wrinkles and puffiness, based on Recommended Retail Price.


 

Size: 15mL

KEY FEATURES

• Reduces appearance of deep wrinkles in 4 weeks.

Warnings

Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse with water.

Ingredients

Water, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Isohexadecane, Isopropyl Isostearate, Stearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Cetyl Alcohol, Titanium Dioxide, Behenyl Alcohol, Polyacrylamide, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Benzyl Alcohol, Ethylparaben, PEG-100 Stearate, Dimethiconol, Methylparaben, Propylparaben, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Glucoside, Laureth-7, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77491).

Directions

Use morning and evening on cleansed skin. Massage a small amount around the eye area - under eyes, outer corners, eyelids - and smooth in until thoroughly absorbed.

USAGE ADVICE

1. Cleanse:
Cleanse daily with an Olay Cleanser to remove impurities and make -up.
2. Prepare:
Apply Olay's lightweight oils and essences and serums to help make skin receptive to anti-ageing ingredients.
3. Treat-Eye:
Apply Ultimate Eye Cream daily around eyes, paying special attention to dark circles, eye bags and crow's feet.
4. Moisture:
Recommended to use with Olay Total Effects Normal SPF15 moisturiser during the day and Total Effects Night Cream at night.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
